pageContext.description: 2 semi-circles at edge are ribbed. Good condition. Metal recently removed at A. Edge anciently re-hammered.
pageContext.surface: Fairly smooth and shiny. Face not shown is more worn. Some thin rough green encrustment.
pageContext.collection: Ludlow Museum,transferred from Whitechurch Museum, Shropshire,from Collection of the late Mrs. Lloyd of Rhogalt, near Corwen,Presented by her nephew, the late Main P.T. Godsal,Iscoyd Park,near Whitechurch,Flints,(No.2)
pageContext.site: unprovenanced,wales,probably merionethshire,corwen,probably from rhagalt property near corwen
